title: LF Top/Mid laner for flex team, Gold-Plat team.
body:
My team is looking for a top laner or a Mid laner that can hold their own on Meta champs and also comfort picks. We're planning to compete in online weekend tourneys and weekly tournaments as well. When you are chosen we want to build a practice schedule for 5s and solo queue in order to continually improve. If you are interested please fill out the following below: 

IGN: 
Role: 
Season 6 rank:
Current rank:
Top 5 Champs in your role: 
Timezone:
Strengths:
Weaknesses: 
Team/Competitive Experience (if any):
Discord (Y/N): 


(Optional) Any additional info about yourself you feel like you wish to include please feel more than free.


Add Tormey and Sawyer30 if you wish to tryout.
